name: SoriRun
description:
SoriRun is a short shooting audiogame. 

You need stereo audio devices to play.  The game does not contain any screen component. 

You can listen to the player and the enemies during the game. Press left and right arrows on the keyboard to move the player. Press space to shoot towards the direction. 

During the game, enemies appear from left and right. The game is over when you are hit by an enemy. You can crash the enemy by the shoot. You have to shoot multiple times to crash a larger enemy.
